channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- hawtio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- hawtio

item.title: CVE-2017-7556|2024-08-05T16:04:12.050Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- hawtio
item.description: Hawtio versions up to and including 1.5.3 are vulnerable to CSRF vulnerability allowing remote attackers to trick the user to visit their website containing a malicious script which can be submitted to hawtio server on behalf of the user.
